Grand Master Tobias:
Congratulations! You have now become a proud Dark Elven Shillien Oracle. Life as a Shillien Oracle may still be unfamiliar, but do not be anxious. You can learn the skills you need one step at a time from the nearby masters.
May you become a devoted Shillien Oracle who proclaims the names of Shilen and Gran Kain to the world. Congratulations once again!
Our guild has prepared this small gift to assist you in your journey. Take this to the Grand Master, Grand Magister, Master Trainer or High Priest who permits transfers in any major town and you will be able to exchange it for a usable Shadow Weapon.
